website_summaries.verdict: This stapler is backed by a lifetime warranty and comes at a good price.
pros: Rated for up to 25 sheets of paper
Adjustable for the number of sheets you need to staple
Works on AC power or battery power
Uses standard staples and comes with staples loaded
cons: The stapler is advertised as quiet, but still had a normal level of noise

customer_reviews.title: Keeps middle schoolers amused for hours; great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Got it, loved it. Used it at school. After a few months, it stopped working. I emailed the seller just asking about any possible warranty or repair options and they expedited a new one to me within literally fewer than 24 hours from my message. I guess an automatic stapler is an automatic stapler, but the customer service gets all those happy, happy stars. (Also, are my middle schoolers the only ones in the world over the moon excited about automatic staplers? What is with that? I swear it’s like a caveman discovering fire.)
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Jammed and then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved this stapler when we first purchased it but after about 8 or 9 months it jammed and then the staple drawer would not click back in so we cannot use it anymore. I attempted to contact the company for a replacement because this listing says the stapler has a lifetime warranty but I never heard back from them. I guess I will be buying another stapler from a different company. At this point I would not recommend this product or this company.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The first stapler I received had a bad motor. It made an awful screeching sound the ...
customer_reviews.text: The first stapler I received had a bad motor. It made an awful screeching sound the first time I used it and did not staple at all. One email to EcoElectronix and a replacement was on the way (thanks Seth!). Apparently I received a stapler with a bad motor, which is rare. The replacement stapler works great! Love that it uses standard staples, and easily staples through 20 pages. It's quiet and efficient. Very happy with the purchase, and especially with EcoElectronix.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty!!! Do not TRUST this company
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and it quit working after 5 months. I've sent 5 emails and no response. Bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Autolizer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this stapler for work, first day worked once. Had to open the staple tray, remove the staples, replace the staples, close the tray before it would work again. Worked once. Had to open the staple tray, remove the staples, replace the staples, close the tray before it would work again. Worked once. Had to open the staple tray, remove the staples, replace the staples, close the tray before it would work again. Worked once. YOU GET THE PICTURE... Wish I had paid more attention to the negative reviews before purchasing this brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Junk and Warranty is Simply Lip Service
customer_reviews.text: We had these in service for a month and within three days, they started jamming and not working. Wrote Amazon as well as EcoElectronix a letter for replacement and haven't heard anything back. Do not purchase unless you want to waste your money!!! Their warranty is just lip service!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Total Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher I need a reliable quick stapler that works!! We read "How to operate, etc.." as soon as I received it. IT cost more than I usually pay so naturally I did not want to do anything incorrectly; this one would last!! It worked the first week, then constant jamming!! I used the correct sized staplers. TOTAL DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.author: mgb4nb

customer_reviews.title: a manuel stapler is quicker and easier to use
customer_reviews.text: Sometime this stapler works, and sometime you have to pick it up and fiddle around with it to get the paper to hit the right spot before it will staple anything. very frustrating don't recommend if you need it for everyday office use.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 months later...
customer_reviews.text: and now the stapler only works when it wants to. I rarely use my home office so the amount of use was minimal. I typically use it plugged in, but decided to try using battery power to see if it would work more consistently. Unfortunately, whether the unit is plugged in or using battery power the unit hardly ever works. I've tried changing the angle of approach, switched out staples, changed the alignment, and nothing! I was so excited to find an electric stapler with a good capacity for a reasonable amount of money, but this was a total let down!
customer_reviews.author: Star3108

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Seth and Marina reached out via email to follow up - after testing the product, I noticed my battery function wasn't working properly. I posed a question back to their email, asking if it was perhaps user error. They provided me guidance/knowledge on the product, and collectively we came to the conclusion it might be defective; they rush shipped me a new stapler, and within a couple of days I have a brand new product. AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE! Thank you both so much! Great product, too. :)
customer_reviews.author: liv.inreallife

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Stapler... and the Seller stands behind it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Stapler over two years ago and love how it improves my productivity. Very simple to use hands-free, and batteries last a long time. I like to carry it around the office, so I've never used the AC Adapter. Last week my stapler stopped working for some unknown reason. I contacted the Seller to ask about the "Lifetime Guarantee" and they immediately shipped a replacement unit at no cost. In this day and age, finding a company that stands behind its promises is rare, and very much appreciated. I wouldn't hesitate to buy this Stapler, it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Burning Stapler
customer_reviews.text: These 2 staplers were purchased in September 2018. I bought them to have extra staplers in the office. We took it out today 1/9/19 and plugged it in to use and it started smoking brand new out of the box. Needless to say it is totally unusable. I would like a replacement but understand the 30 day window is closed. Hoping if your company reads this an adjustment can be made.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy ditillio

customer_reviews.title: This is a family company worthy of your support
customer_reviews.text: In a day where customer service is often lacking these folks are amazing. Had the original unit for five years when it no longer would operate on battery. Still performed 100% if plugged in. Just for grins I sent them an email asking how I could repair it myself. They said don't bother it's guaranteed for life we'll send you a new one. They promised to "expedite" the shipping. Well, they are in California and I'm in Florida. Got the replacement the next day !!! This is pricier than others you can buy but it has many features you'll like. Can't beat the product, guarantee, or service !!
customer_reviews.author: Chef903

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that this stapler uses regular staples rather than a cartridge. Although I haven’t used it with just batteries yet, it’s nice to have a wireless option. It easily staples but the drawer tends to stick when you try to reload and I’m afraid that pulling too hard might break it off completely. I use this at work and go through a strip or two daily and it’s held up very well so far. *edit* I upgraded this a star because the customer service is excellent. I had an issue with my stapler and it was replaced with expedited shipping and no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Meyers

customer_reviews.title: worked great until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this stapler. Then suddenly it stopped working. Reached out to seller who replied promptly with some reasonable additional questions. I replied immediately. Since then nothing. Very disappointed. It's advertised with a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It may look a bit unobtrusive, but it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best electric staplers I've owned. It is easy to operate and functions just like it's supposed to - you add 6 AA batteries or plug in the AC adapter, and load your strip of staples (mine came preloaded). I played with the throat depth a bit to get it the staple where I like it and smiled every time I heard the mechanism and felt the buzzing little ka-chunk as scads of paper was organized and filed. There is a lifetime warranty on this stapler. That is almost unheard of on equipment like this. Talk about peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: R Russell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!.....Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in (what seemed like) less than 24hrs. It's light weight (not heavy or bulky like the old ones). Only tiny drawback, it needs (6)AAA batteries to operate w/o it's power cord. I initially thought because it's sleek, slender frame how would all those batteries fit in there? I do love that the power cord is an option in addition to the batteries. Lifetime Warranty was also very easy to register, completed it online and it took seconds. Haven't had the opportunity yet to staple anything up to it's capacity, (just small office jobs) but I'm confident I won't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a little over a year, it worked great for the whole time then it randomly started to malfunction. The mechanism would trigger (i.e. it made the noise) but no staple was released. I emailed the company and within 24 hours I had a response from one of the owners and within 72 hours a new stapler was on its way at no charge. I wish more companies had customer service of this quality! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: PNK

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler but not for very busy settings
customer_reviews.text: The pros: Low noise level, can handle a lot of pages, it has lifetime warranty and the seller offers a really amazing client service, they are very diligent, answer pretty fast and solve any issue you may have. The cons: It couldn't handle 400+ daily prescription leaflets and paper bags at a retail pharmacy for more than a few months. It just suddenly stopped working. I really was in love with my stapler it just couldn't handle the job for so long . I highly recommend for an office, household use or other job settings but not for retail pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: MCollazo

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bostitch Electric Stapler!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome stapler. I have gone through a few Bostitch Electric staplers and they jam so easily! I actually gave up on electric stapler until my wrist recently started to hurt from excessive stapling. I staple about 100 times a day and this definitely saves my wrist from the traditional stapler. What's even better is that this uses regular staples! I don't need to go buy special "crowned" staples like I had to with Bostitch. I highly recommend this stapler even for commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Mommy

customer_reviews.title: GOod product, good price, hopefull it will last
customer_reviews.text: Used a Bostitch B8E for about 6 months until their staple trigger wasnt working anymore. While I create the warranty claim for that, I couldnt wait so decided to purchase the EcoElectronix EX-25. Its a smaller footprint but the noise is much quieter vs. the Bostitch. Only thing im getting used to is the staple position, the staple gets placed about an inch deep from the edge, which is a little deeper than I wanted. But im getting used to it. Edit: I just realized you can adjust how deep the staple goes in from the edge, so now its pretty perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sangbang

customer_reviews.title: adjustable position
customer_reviews.text: A stapler is just a stapler. Right? This EX-25 is truly a cut above. You can adjust how deeply, from the sheet edge, the staple actually enters the sheet. No problem going thru 10 or 15 sheet of bond paper. They include an A/c wire to "plug" the stapler into your normal wall socket. I discovered on my third purchased EX-25 that the unit will run on batteries. The third unit's position made running an electrical cord problematic. It works just fine on normal AA batteries. Add to all these features a Life Time Warranty and you have a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. HYATT

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days, but I am very impressed. The quality is excellent, well made and I love the depth setting feature. That had me confused at first. I thought that meant how deep the staple would go in, to allow for the amount of paper being stapled. Perhaps a little clearer instructions would be beneficial, but not a big deal. What they meant was how far in from the papers edge would the staple be placed. Again, not a big deal. It's a great product with a very good price. I've seen many other brands priced at double the cost of this one, and not with a lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.author: OTK

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service on a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. I used it for 1.5 years and unfortunately, it stopped working. The stapler was used a lot every day. However, I was contacted by the manufacturer and they stand behind their warranty. The product was replaced and I still keep using it. Very happy with this stapler and impressed with the seller and their customer service. -quiet (it is a stapler so it will make some noise of course) -easy to use -love the option of the batteries or cord. -looks good (black clean design, small compared to other electric staplers)
customer_reviews.author: Alexej Muran

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is extremely reliable. We use it at our business 6 days week, 8 hours a day, approximately 20-30 staples per hour. After a couple of years, the stapler stopped working. We contact the seller and they expedite a replacement right away. Customer service has always been great, very easy to deal with, and they stand behind their lifetime warranty. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use this stapler in my personal home office and it's great! I like that it gives you different staple depth settings to play with so you can figure which one you like best. The only thing I didn't like (which doesn't take away from it's function or my decision to buy again/recommend), is that is it not quiet as described. When it staples, it's powerful no doubt, but loud! So if you're prone to loud noise jumps...be prepared!
customer_reviews.author: stormy

customer_reviews.title: Used daily at work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work since one of my co-workers was a senior and the normal stapler was hard on her hands (arthritis). The company I worked for had supplied a cheaper model and it broke as is common with many electric staplers. Looking over the reviews and being recommended by Amazon, I decided to give this one a try. It was a well worth purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Howard

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty & they mean it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Stapler in Sept of 2018 and it recently malfunctioned. When I was researching a replacement on Amazon, I found that this stapler has a lifetime warranty. I contacted the Seller and it was replaced, expedited shipping within the same week. Until it broke this stapler worked perfectly, it's quiet, doesn't jam. The replacement service from the Company was the best experience I have ever had for a warranty of any kind. Much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: eileen-s

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Convenient, excellent stapler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cramped office space 11 months ago. I needed a compact, strong and energy efficient stapler. This is a wonderful stapler. I'm trilled with the # of pages I can staple, no misfeeds (unless I use old staples - so don't do that!) and awesome when I need to use it as cordless stapler. My frozen shoulders appreciate this convenience tremendously. I wish it were quieter, but I'm sound sensitive and is still quieter than the other office heavy duty staplers. I love this stapler. Update: 8/11/20 - Love it so much that I purchased another when I changed employers.
customer_reviews.author: NanLoi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: The look is what caught my eye and the fact the other brand we normally purchase was not what I wanted. Tried something different and very glad I did! This stapler if fairly quiet (I work in a very busy environment, so this may be skewed a bit) I can still hear the stapler over the noise so i am thinking it may not be the "quietest". I use about 50 staples a day and I have not had any issues. I did email the company with a question and the owner replied within 24 hours. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppoholic

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but.....
customer_reviews.text: When the sensor senses it staples papers just as you would expect.....there are times when the sensor won't sense and you keep trying and trying until it works.....the whole concept is to be able to staple quickly....not try and try again.
customer_reviews.author: cbb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler over a year ago. It worked fine and helped so much at school. At the beginning of this school year, it just stopped working. I contacted the company regarding the stapler and the warranty. They gladly replaced the stapler. Unfortunately the replacement didn't work (turns out it was the outlet I was plugging it into) but they replaced that one as well. Terrific customer service and a great product that this teacher is happy to have!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stapler - EcoElectronix Stands by the Lifetime Warrantee
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the EX-25 Automatic Heavy Duty Stapler last year and have used it for 1-year. The stapler worked great until last month it malfunctioned. Looking back on Amazon to order a new stapler, I saw the notice that the EX-25 has a lifetime replacement warrantee. I contacted EcoElectronix and they forwarded a new replacement at no cost. This is an outstanding product and company who backs their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in May. It's August now and is getting thrown out. It worked well up until the past few weeks. The refill tray began to stick when trying to pull out and put back in. Now, it's stuck out and won't go in at all. It worked fine but feels extremely cheap. I'll be ordering another brand and hoping for better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Foxtrot Sierra

customer_reviews.title: "I love it! I have had a couple of other ...
customer_reviews.text: "I love it! I have had a couple of other electric staplers and they each lasted 3 or 4 years. I have a tax preparation business, so use it a lot. I’ll admit I was a little hesitant about this one because it was so small as compared to my others and not as heavy, but I like the way it handles the job with less noise and good job. I do not use it on batteries, I have it plugged into the outlet at all times as I use it so much."
customer_reviews.author: Rube7878

customer_reviews.title: Thumb pain went away from using the stapler so much!
customer_reviews.text: My job requires using the stapler almost every day, multiple times a day running a wholesale business. Stapling so much caused pain and also a slight bump that I could feel in my thumb-joint area. I picked up this little beauty on here on Amazon after reading all the reviews and I could not be more pleased! The pain and the bump is gone! Easy to use and not to mention you can use standard AA batteries or the ac adapter that is included. The customer service is superb as well! Will continue to shop with EcoElectronix in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joeun

customer_reviews.title: What I needed for a big job
customer_reviews.text: Works well once you get the hang of it. Out of the box I had trouble adjusting it so the staples would be close to the edge (the slider was very stiff, stuck in place even). Once I got that figured out it took a little practice to be able to staple quickly. I would only buy this if you have LOTS of stapling to do. Easily does 25 sheets of standard 20 lb paper. A bit more of 18 lb paper.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: ordered this in march for work bc stapling by hand 400-500 times a day was hurting too much. worked like a charm!! even with constant stacks of thick papers (think 8 pages folded brochure style, and stapled perfectly!) until last week when a floater who covered for us somehow jammed it beyond repair... i contacted the seller who was so prompt and helpful with replies! they sent me a replacement right away. amazing!!!!! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: annkin

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Fake positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: Literally garbage. Read reviews, bought 2 as Christmas gifts for pharmacy techs with sore hands in a busy pharmacy. I was told that this was garbage right out of the box; it couldn’t even staple 2 pieces of paper together. Since this was a gift, I didn’t hear that it was garbage until the return window was closed and it was too late to return. Boo!!
customer_reviews.author: TXSH

customer_reviews.title: Great lifetime warranty experience
customer_reviews.text: We used this stapler for 20 months before it failed. This unit is unique since you can use it hand held vs desktop. It’s used in our craft room with moderate use Our lifetime warranty experience was terrific. We emailed the company, they responded within hours, and after sending them our amazon order number they shipped us a new unit in 2 days!!! I really have no idea why so many reviews mentioned that they couldn’t get the Lifetime warranty honored. But our experience couldn’t have been better or more satisfying Loving the replacement unit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stallard

customer_reviews.title: Great product and warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The EX-25 Automatic Heavy Duty Stapler is perfect for my needs. I had purchased a half-strip electric stapler previously and it worked great, but in my busy office, I was constantly reloading it. My supervisor had bought this stapler when I got my smaller one and has been very happy with it. (There was a problem with her first one and the company replaced it quickly.) Love the lifetime warranty, which I made sure to register right away. I would definitely recommend this stapler!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marquart

customer_reviews.title: Great for productivity
customer_reviews.text: I love this stapler. I work as an automotive service advisor and one of my co-workers had an electric stapler. He told me how much he spent and found this to try as an alternative. I go through almost a whole row of staples per day and this works great. The noise is a little louder than expected, however this is an amazing value and does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: I am loving it - So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely loving this electric stapler. I have heard that electric staplers jam frequently and don't work for long, but I have not had any trouble with this one. I highly recommend this. I will update this if any problems occur Update - I LOVE this electric stapler. I've had it for around a year. It is still going strong!! I use it for large stapling projects several times a week. I've only had one jamb, and it was my fault, I tried to staple too many papers. I highly, highly recommend this!! It really saves my hands!!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product and small enough to fit on desk
customer_reviews.text: Great price works great and size is small so it does not take up a lot of space on my desk. Plus it uses regular staples. I had another type but had to purchase special staples and they were very costly. Some say it is very noisy but it really isn’t bad at all. I would recommend this hands down. Thanks for a great affordable product
customer_reviews.author: Mary Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great Stapler!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, I liked this stapler. It's attractive and I immediately tried it out. It produced a nice, clean staple. I really like the depth adjustment on this stapler; I can staple close to the edge of the paper or farther in.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use. Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and comes battery-ready & with power cord, so it can be used on-the-go or in the office. Versatile enough to handle single or fairly thick stack of paper. My unit jammed after about 3 months, but the lifetime jam-proof warranty came to my rescue. I contacted Eco via e-mail. They replied promptly and, after exchanging information, supplied me with a new unit. Very nice folks to work with. 'Didn't give the product 5 stars as its durability may be in doubt, but service is excellent. Yes, I would recommend product to others.
customer_reviews.author: AM-Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Customer service with EcoElectronix is excellent. As is the stapler which is quiet and ...
customer_reviews.text: The stapler came on time as promised. My wife is using it for her school class for a couple days now and absolutely loves it. I posted a question about the life time warranty that was stated on the product description but no where in the packing or instructions that came with the stapler. They contacted me within 1 day and assured me that there is a lifetime guarantee on the stapler. Customer service with EcoElectronix is excellent. As is the stapler which is quiet and efficiently staples multiple sheets with ease. You cannot go wrong with this stapler including a great price.
customer_reviews.author: kefamily5

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well when plugged in. Didn't work well on batteries. Not for big stacks of paper. Mine jammed when trying to staple a large document and wouldn't work after that. I wrote to Eco. They responded with 24 hours offering to send me a replacement. What a pleasant surprise. However, I think I need a more heavy duty stapler for my type of work. Although I wouldn't buy the same stapler for my needs, I would definitely buy what I do need from this company. I'm pleasantly shocked by their rapid and attentive service.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cherner

customer_reviews.title: Ok for light duty but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. Internal parts are not heavy duty. Ours broke (To be fair, we were pushing it to its limits). My son (who can fix almost anything, took it apart,Added a few parts, fixed it (and made it better). He was not impressed with the internal design. He made some easy modifications to make it better and stronger. It works well if you don’t push it to it’s limits and I really like the adjustable depth gage. I would buy another but only because my son could modify it when the time came for the repair.
customer_reviews.author: Sonic

customer_reviews.title: Battery port stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stapler. I used it for two weeks With new batteries and it lasted thru thousands of staples and then I replaced with new batteries the battery port stopped working. It still is functional with the plug in, however I got this to be portable and now I have to search for a place to plug in and there is not always one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol james

customer_reviews.title: Well built electric stapler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replaced a battery operated swingline stapler that would lose power quickly. This electric stapler comes with a AC power supply which I recommend using because you get constant full power fade free powerful stapling. It is well built, adjustable staple positioning. Lifetime warranty, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trailblazer15

customer_reviews.title: Company integrity
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have the strength to take their advice on how to get it refilled. So I gave it away to a younger stronger person. They didn't give up. They offer a refund but I told them no I would not feel right since I don't have the stapler to return. But it says a lot about their company that they tried to make things right.
customer_reviews.author: Vera McHale

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my electric stapler. It came in one day and was exactly as described. I have registered it and got immediate feedback on my Lifetime Replacement Warranty. It doesn't get any better than that. I wanted to be able to plug it in rather than be replacing batteries and this item gives me both options. Some other great features are the long electrical cord, and the ability to adjust how far down the page you want it to place the staple. I think I got the best electric stapler for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the EcoElectronix EX-25 stapler after reading numerous reviews of most popular brand electric staplers. The LIFETIME Warranty was important during my research as well. Item received as promised and is working as designed. Easily staples multiple pages and thick papers. Could not be happier thus far. Should it fail or have any defects in the future I will update this rating.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly normal and useful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black one and I got a white one instead. But no matter -- it gets the job done. The stapler comes with batteries and an adapter to be plugged into the wall. You are able to adjust the "depth", that is, how down you want the stapler to go from the starting position at the top. A manual stapler sounds great and all, but I'm a sucker for this one. It's so fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: This is the second electric stapler (same model) I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second electric stapler (same model) I have purchased for a friend of mine who is a second grade teacher. She took the first one to her classroom and asked me to reorder her another for home. It works extremely well and saves her time and energy for those weekly homework packets or graded test packets. A previous electric stapler she purchased from Staples did not stand up to heavy use. I would say the repeat order is the highest praise possible from a working teacher who is constantly putting her own money out of pocket for her kids!"
customer_reviews.author: KatChat

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty stapler
customer_reviews.text: I use this stapler in my classroom. I have used it to staple mini booklets and various forms and notices that I send home. This product can be plugged in or battery-powered. It is quiet and small, so I can take it with me when I move around in my classroom. Cons: It is limited in the number of sheets of paper it can staple. The slide that holds the staples can be difficult to load. Once I stapled a packet that was too thick so a staple got stuck and the slide would not eject. I had to force it open. I thought it would break but it didn’t. This product is better suited for light-duty use.
customer_reviews.author: Youngw808

customer_reviews.title: Good product and exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this item in December 2019 and it has seen moderate use since then. Last month, the stapler suddenly jammed and would not function at all. I contacted EcoElectronix via email and their customer service staff responded immediately. After providing some basic information, they responded and said they were shipping a replacement right away. A brand new replacement arrived in a very timely manner and I am back in business. All I can say is the product is again working fine and the company's customer support is exceptional. I highly recommend this seller. Thanks EcoElectronix, great job!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lum

customer_reviews.title: dishonest company.  their life time warranty does not work. My mistake. apology warranted
customer_reviews.text: My previous posting was an error I posted the stapler jams a lot. It's probably due to a malfunction. I overreacted when I posted the company was dishonest and did not respond. The company did respond and sent a replacement promptly. I am very pleased with their response. I sincerely apologize for my negative review. They are responsive and honest.
customer_reviews.author: geri hing

customer_reviews.title: Eco Electronix Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Received overnight. Smaller than the last few I've had but staples great. Much quieter than my old staplers. Got tired of replacing staplers every couple of years. This one comes with a lifetime warranty for replacement if it stops working. Not as expensive as the others I've used either. Love how easy it is to adjust the staple placement setting, this stapler has a large placement area from about 2" to 1/4". Only had it a couple of days but works like the larger more expensive ones I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: WalCat

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! First electric stapler (bought two) I've used other heavy-duty (another brand) staplers for almost 30 years and well I just got tired of staple jams. We put stacks of house plans together almost every day and this sliced right through like a hot knife in butter! I'm impressed! Hoping it holds up for years to come! Debra
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: It's been a few months and it's still chugging along
customer_reviews.text: We use this stapler at work for 2-10 sheets at a time. Most of the time it's 2 sheets. It works great. It hasn't broken itself apart like our mega industrial staplers did (twice). We also put googly eyes on it so it's our lab buddy now. Everyone likes it. I would recommend this for our use case of about 20-30 uses per day, 2-10 sheets of paper at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Talkahuano

customer_reviews.title: The little stapler that could
customer_reviews.text: I work in a pharmacy and we staple the bags with the labels, drug information, etc. all together after we finish verifying a prescription. We used to buy $300+ automatic staplers that had a half-life of about 3 months. I decided to give this one a try because of the value and great reviews. We haven't been dissapointed. We've been using it over a year, 500+ staples a day stapling multiple sheets of paper/labels and bags without any issues. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bluth

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is of very high quality and really exceeded my expectations. I use it rigorously (1000+ staples per week) and I haven't had a problem with jamming and it doesn't kill my wrists! I will definitely purchase another one in the future/near future. It's super nice that you can use batteries or the wall adapter! I also received excellent customer service from Seth.
customer_reviews.author: Hfzeus

customer_reviews.title: This thing has a mind of its own and staples randomly and uncontrollably.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking stapler. BUT, I plugged it in, tested it, worked great... AND THEN it starts uncontrollably stapling on it’s own. It ran through about 10-15 staples before it could get it unplugged. I plugged it back in twice more and had the same weird thing - unsolicited uncontrolled unstoppable stapling. DEF sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Steimel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. You can hand hold, or leave it sitting on your desk. It plugs in or uses batteries. I prefer the plug in option so no one can "borrow" it. Anyway, works great, just what I needed, very pleased with this product. Also, never mentioned in reviews, uses standard staples. Not too lightweight so won't fall over. I have tried up to 20 pages, no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: ladyesmiles

customer_reviews.title: No more hand or wrist pain!
customer_reviews.text: I staple hundreds of documents a day while on the job. My hand and wrist was getting very sore so I purchased the stapler. And I am so thankful that I did the pain is gone and I can actually work much faster now. I staple up to 20 to 25 pages, the staples go right through and hold very well. I would highly recommend this stapler to anybody who does a lot of stapling every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and fast.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this unit today. Easy setup, simple directions, and great performance. Although I have not tried to staple 25 sheets, I believe it can handle the task. A very minor annoyance, the machine lacks a "low staple" warning light. Perhaps the manufacturer could add this feature to future models. Otherwise, it appears to be a well-made machine and a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: andy4

customer_reviews.title: Handy automatic stapler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler for work because I staple all day and it’s bad for your wrists and hand. So far so good. Pros: It’s small so I can pick it up and staple bigger items than just paper. It fits in small spaces, it uses regular staples, no need to order a special kind. It has not given me any issues for the past month. Also, it’s not heavy, it has the weight of a regular desk stapler. Cons: it’s hard to think of one, the only thing maybe is I wish It had a light that indicates it’s out of staples in the front of the stapler.
customer_reviews.author: MRSJOA

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described
customer_reviews.text: I like this stapler overall however I wish it had a manual staple function. I have a different brand that will allow you to take it off auto and then when you push slightly on it, it staples. That is a really handy feature. But other than that, it's great. It goes through a fairly think amount of paper without jamming. That's great.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H.

customer_reviews.title: The stapler is great, the companies staff is also great
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an old electric stapler. The old one weighed a ton and was loud and plugged into an electric socket only. The new one is so light I thought the insides were missing. The new EX-25 also can run on batteries or plugin. After it is delivered the company head sends a letter thanking you and asking to help if there are any problems, and again when you register it for the lifetime warranty. Now that is service!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have!
customer_reviews.text: Every month I have to prepare approximately 500+ purchase order & invoices for payment. For years I did it all with a manual stapler. Then a few months ago I purchased this auto stapler and what a difference! Makes the whole process quicker and just saves stress on the wrist and fingers. I HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last a Day
customer_reviews.text: I stapled three items - 2 pages each - then it jammed and has not worked since. I purchased a Bostitch immediately thereafter - it is a workhorse and has performed beautifully. The Bostitch was only $3 more . . . definitely work the extra. So sorry I wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bargain electric stapler
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the purchase of this electric stapler. Although very low priced, it has the same features and performance as many of the higher priced electric staplers offered through Amazon. This model is notable for it’s small desk footprint and it's metal working parts: it takes no more space on a desktop than a standard heavy duty manual stapler and is heavy enough to stay in place when in operation. Also, although a plug in power supply was included with this model, it works quite well on battery power. Overall, this is quite a bargain."
customer_reviews.author: Ted J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my students!!
customer_reviews.text: My middle school students think this stapler is so cool. The students have gone through three traditional manual types of staplers this school year. This electric stapler requires no touching or lifting, so I am confident this will last a long time. It staples so quickly and with ease.,
customer_reviews.author: kwein

customer_reviews.title: A great stapler for up to 25 pages
customer_reviews.text: I use this stapler for putting together information for teacher workshops as well as just for everyday use. It is very easy to use. One note: the first time I had to replace staples, I realized that I had to (after unplugging the stapler) really pull on the staple tray to get it to come out; I felt as if I might break something. But that is just the way it works, and it pushes back in the same way. I would certainly recommend this stapler, and the company's focus on eco-friendly products is wonderful. So is the lifetime warranty!!
customer_reviews.author: KimY

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable depth, but slight staple delay
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool stapler. I like that you can adjust the depth. The only thing I would change is the delay in stapling. You have to hold it in there for a full second before it staples. Everything else about it is perfect. UPDATE: I had an issue with the stapler, and the seller was kind enough to send a new one (same model of course)! This is a very good company to work with that backs up the products. I would do business with this company anytime! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Don Beusee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Bought yet another one! They work so great and have the best customer service if needed! We purchased another because the first one works so good. I currently use it at my home office with the AC adapter, but then take it with me when I go to the multiple other locations I subcontract at and use the batteries. It is perfect! My husband uses his at his office. No more hand cramping trying to staple 20 pages together :)
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use stapler.
customer_reviews.text: “I love it. I have lost strength between my thumb and index finger due to an arm injury. As a result, I don’t have enough strength to squeeze a manual stapler anymore. I have retired but when I was working, we had auto staplers. I loved them. So, now I have this one and I love it just as much. Thanks for making such a nice, high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Dacey

customer_reviews.title: Very good design!
customer_reviews.text: Compact enough to fit under monitors on the desk top, powerful and fast. When I wrote to ask where I could buy the optional AC power unit, the company sent an email back with a tracking number for a free adapter that they had already mailed to me! I like that this stapler is as small as most of the ones that only take half a strip of staples but it accepts the full length strip. Best power stapler by far! I'm usually pretty critical of equipment because there is always some corner-cutting on reasonably priced items (lots of it on cheap items) but I'd consider this to be very reasonably priced and worth more.
customer_reviews.author: dave c.

customer_reviews.title: It's alive!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I plug the stapler in it starts shooting staples out! I can't find a switch or any way to make an adjustment for it. While I appreciate it's enthusiasm, it's a little too extra...sending it back and ordering another Swingline.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Lu

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try in the office. Other staplers were hard for some to use. This one whacks the staple into papers without effort. Rarely a staple jam. The one we received is a little tight when you pull out the track to add staples, but other than that it is a great addition to the office. Even the skeptical people have been won over. The other staplers now sit collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: DM-C

customer_reviews.title: Saves your hands on a big project
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, who is a kindergarten teacher, and she loves it. I used it for a while before giving it to her, and was pleased to find that it was relatively quiet, and it stapled without difficulty every time. It's light but stays steady on the table and is small enough to cart around if needed for projects away from home. I had done a big stapling job for her before purchasing this and my hands were sore, prompting me to find a product like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Company / Exceptional Products / Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stapler!! However, the staple tray always stuck when I had to refill it! I lived with the issue for as long as I could since I needed the stapler as my right hand is damaged and can no longer work an ordinary stapler until I finally had to reach out to the company regarding the issue. Fortunately, this company has exceptional customer service and I received a replacement stapler within a day without any hassle. Nor didI I lose a day without a stapler at work since the stapler arrived on a Sunday!! I would have given the stapler 5 stars except for the sticky staple tray.
customer_reviews.author: Kristiansenx2

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust depth
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this would have worked fine but I was unable to move the depth adjustment....it would not budge and I am not going to have to spend a lot of time on something that should be simple or have to get out pliers, so I returned it. It may be fine for other people here but for me it was a no-go
customer_reviews.author: Jill Roberts

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and so far so good in testing it. The stapler holder part does stick but you just need to push or pull on it a bit hard to make it go in and out. I like that you can adjust how far in you want the staplease to go on the paper.
customer_reviews.author: cec

customer_reviews.title: It broke after a few months.  No response from seller to warranty claims
customer_reviews.text: The stapler worked well for a few months. then the adjustment nob for the paper would no longer stay in a fixed position. That was annoying. Then the stapler started buzzing and misfiring when I placed 10 or 15 sheets in the stapler. I tried to contact the seller through amazon a week ago. No response. Now I tried again. I am waiting for a response. This lifetime warranty is looking more like nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Love the life time warranty!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these Eco staplers in our pharmacy for daily use. One of the staplers stopped working last week and I got a replacement immediately. The response time was outstanding! Great job guys! I'll be referring your products to other stores in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher so this stapler gets pretty heavy use, and it's awesome! Easy to use and totally saved my hands. Also, when the staple tray broke (yeah, in the future I will definitely not be allowing students to use the stapler...) I emailed them about how to fix it and instead they offered to replace it for free! Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible burning/smoke smell
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after I started using it I smelled this horrible burning, smoke smell in my home office. I thought that there was a fire and looked all around until I realized that it was coming from the stapler. I had to put it outside of the house because it was so strong it was setting our smoke alarm off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I own a small business (SpidersWebFabric Shop) and we staple LOTS paperwork for our orders after cutting and packing the fabrics. This is a really nice electric stapler...., good quality.... works perfect. Has an adapter if you want to plug it in....or uses batteries. I like the fact you can set where you want the staple to go on the paper. Staples really quick! I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Z

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Have had this stapler for a few weeks now. I often have to staple 200 sets of multi-page documents, and this stapler handles it very well. Not a single jam or miss. I especially like that I can adjust the depth to control where on the page the staple will be placed - that is an outstanding feature! I would definitely recommend this electric stapler.
customer_reviews.author: PMcD

customer_reviews.title: Great for repetitive use
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and perfect for my job environment where I am constantly stapling papers and paper bags. It's adjustable feature is useful in where to staple papers together. It works smoothly and does not jam easily. It also can handle stapling paper bags. I would definitely recommend this stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Hash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable stapler--just works.
customer_reviews.text: No wonder so many 5 stars. I wanted one to replace the one that wore out after 10+ years of occasional use. I maybe replaced the batteries once. It just stapled through 16 layers (did not try more) perfectly. I love that it's heavy, stays put, runs on Batteries but can use 120V (adapter included). A strip of staples included. Easy one hand operation without picking it up. Perfect home office stapler and probably good for daily use in an office. Worth a couple of 20's every 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: denpick

customer_reviews.title: Good stapler.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler to replace one of similar size from one of the larger office supply companies - which only lasted a couple months. After refilling the staples a few times the stapler jammed and would not clear. It was useless. This one appears to be of much better quality and better made. I hope that it will last longer. I've only been using it about a week, but it has been easy to use and dependable so far! No jams and staples at least 20 sheets or so without a problem. If there is, I hope the lifetime warranty covers any problems. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: ERRATIC THEN NADA
customer_reviews.text: This stapler was difficult to use from the start because it was hard to find the spot the paper had to be in to trigger the stapling response. Then, about three months into its life, it died. Now there Is nothing, nada, no stapling, no matter what. Too expensive to die so young!
customer_reviews.author: Old Pink 1944

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the smallness discourage you.
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. Arrived as stated. Incredibly light weight. Thought it would bounce all over my Desk. It remained steady during extreme testing of assorted pieces of paper. Never missed a beat. Used Batteries to power first time around. My Office Mgr confiscated it first day out. She liked the looks and design. The Highs: Powerful .Portable. Attractive Design.Ease of use.Affordable cost Comes with complete strip of staples. Good job Amazon. Another winner!
customer_reviews.author: MR XENO

customer_reviews.title: Great Little stapler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stapler to replace a Corporate Express I had been using for ten years. After a few weeks I can honestly say this is a great little stapler. I say little only because it is much smaller than what I am used to. I use it frequently and it is standing up nicely. It has not jammed once. I also like that I can use it as a hand held as well as a desktop. Lifetime warranty....yes please.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Bottorff

customer_reviews.title: Nice stapler and great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this stapler for about 2 years and it recently stopped working. I contacted the sellers and, after answering a couple troubleshooting questions, they immediately shipped me out a replacement. I highly recommend this stapler and EcoElectronix.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler for the money
customer_reviews.text: The stapler is powerful. It doesn't jam at all. It is smaller than I thought it would be. It's just a little bigger than a standard stapler. You can use it in your hand or you can set it on a desk. This stapler replaced a $350 Swingline that quit working after daily use for 10 years. Hopefully this one will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: JR

product_meta.title: EX-25 Automatic Heavy Duty Electric Stapler - Includes Staples Power Cable & Lifetime Coverage by EcoElectronix - Jam-Free 25 Sheet Full Strip Staple Capacity for Professional and Home Office Use
feature_bullets: HEAVY-DUTY & QUIET : Quickly and easily staple up to 25 sheets of standard paper using AA batteries or the included Power Adapter. Our heavy-duty stapler is simple-to-use, quiet, and pre-loaded with staples. We thought of everything in our patented design to give you a superior stapling experience. The EX-25 stapler uses Standard 1/4" (0.25 inch) Full Strip Staples. Can be used hands-free to save time and help keep a sanitary work environment.

TRUE LIFETIME WARRANTY: Time tested quality you can count on. Have peace of mind knowing your purchase is backed by our Lifetime Warranty. If your EX-25 stapler ever has an issue we can't fix quickly, we (EcoElectronix) will send a free replacement to your door with no hassle or delay.

YOUR TIME IS YOUR GREATEST ASSET… As busy individuals working in the information age, we all want to find important ways to save time, hassle, and money. That’s why we are so pleased to introduce you to an amazing way to save tons of your valuable time each week. With our EcoElectronix electric stapler, you won’t spend endless amounts of time stapling stacks of paper together. You can enjoy stapling up to 25 sheets of paper in a split-second, without damaging your hands.

SAY GOODBYE TO SORE HANDS FROM STAPLING— FOREVER! Traditional, manual staplers can be a real pain. They cause major problems for your hands and wrists— especially when trying to staple large stacks of paper together. With our EcoElectronix high-end stapler, you’ll never have to worry about getting carpal tunnel and arthritis from repetitive stapling. Our premium electric stapler does all the work for you. So you can enjoy a pain-free, fun, and beautiful stapling experience!

PERFECT ACCURACY WITH EVERY STAPLE: Unless you're a stapling champion, chances are your stapling skills aren’t always on point. We’ve all been there, right? Sometimes stapling too close to the edge, sometimes too far away, or maybe just a mangled staple that didn’t make it all the way through your stack of papers. Our top quality electric stapler solves this annoying problem, by giving you a perfect staple. Every time. Plus, it works on both battery power or AC Power.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,056 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
